name: ajuya
description:
A completely new unique match 3 game in the vein of Planet Puzzle League and other awesome retro puzzle video games!

  • Spin your blocks to line them up and unleash hell on your friends’ highscores.
  • Rack up huge scores with chains and the ultimate match 6 move!
  • Full 3D graphics with beatifully rendered blocks for the ultimate puzzling experience.

Coming April 30th to Windows, with mobile versions following thereafter.
